summary: Walter Pearce (Liotta), a married man, tries to win back his wife (Headley) after cheating on her. Pearce enlists the help of the local high school football star (Sipos) to help him.
cast: Ray Liotta|Shaun Sipos|Glenne Headly|Rachel Blanchard|Brooke Nevin|Brendan Fehr|Brenda Campbell|David Parker|Josh Emerson|Chris Ippolito|Michael St. John Smith|Steve Mitchell|Kira Clavell|Ron Selmour|Stephen Hair|Terry King|Kurtis Sanheim|Ernie Grunwald|Tim Koetting|Lois Holley|David LeReaney|Nkechi Odina|Greg Lawson|Tracy Ryan|Joseph Allan Sutherland|Karen Hines|Lori Ravensborg|Victoria Bennett|Eric Moschopedis|Krista Rae|Crystal Balint|Len Crowther|Lindsay Burns|Kailin See|Michael Green|Sean Anthony Olsen|Katherine Bennett|Gino Savoia|Andy Curtis|Stephanie Hong|Nicole Baldwin|Barbara Beall|Carrie Colak|Sarah Hyslop|Stevie Mitchell|Eduardo Noda|Brendan Prost
title: El juego de los errores
